textAboutMe:
Software Developer with professional B2 English level, with solid experience in Front End & Back End, specialized in ReactJS, Angular, and Node.js. Focused on designing and developing scalable applications, following best practices and modern architectures.

I have knowledge of relational and NoSQL databases, performance optimization and agile development under Scrum & Kanban methodologies. Proficient in GIT and version control, ensuring efficient and collaborative workflows.

I am looking for opportunities to continue growing professionally, take on complex technical challenges, and have the chance to lead development teams in innovative projects.
